column2: an A.M. Eatery////Semolina Pancake (5/5): This was an on-the-house dish and were the absolute highlight of the meal.  The semolina pancake was PERFECT
column6: and fluffy.  It was topped with an amazing maple syrup.  This isn't on the standard menu
column8: seriously amazing.  My dining partners and I all loved this pancake and thought it was hands down the best part of the meal.  I would definitely ask the servers if this is able to be ordered.
